fields.Action:
1- Initiate a CWMP session
	
	2-The ACS sends a Download request to the device for a new firmware file
fields.Expected Result:
1- Check that the device is connected to the ACS server.

2- During the upgrade process:

      - Check that the device is able to accept the Download request from the ACS.

      - Check on the GUI that an alert screen is displayed in order to inform the customer.

      - Check that the Upgrade LED is blinking

The new firmware is correctly updated.

 

{color:#0747a6}*For VZ: Upgrade LED: Fast blink white* {color}

fields.Action: After the upgrade from the version V to the clone V+1, the services status should not be lost.
fields.Expected Result:
The following services need to checked:
 - Internet: Wan connextivity(PPP Credentials), internet browsing....
 - VoIP FXS (Incoming/Outgoing)
 - VoIP DECT/CatIQ (Incoming/Outgoing) (if available)

fields.description:
Before configuring all settings in Version V, a reset hard should be done.

  The Goal is to upgrade the DUT from the version V to the clone version V+1 and Verify the following service:
 - Internet
 - VoIP FXS (Incoming/Outgoing)
 - VoIP DECT/CatIQ (Incoming/Outgoing) (if available)
fields.summary: [TR-069 UPGRADE] Basic Upgrade to Clone - services check
